Reviews.Title: So so - not nearly as good as I expected
Reviews.Author: M. Jablonski
Reviews.Content: 1.  Not compatible with macs.  And the iphone app does not let you search the history on the DVR.2.  Very limited amount of control from a windows machine or from a browser.  (Note: only Internet Explorer or Safari can be used and Safari is more limited than IE, in terms of control.)  As an example, you must go to the physical DVR box to make any changes to the DVR settings.3.  Quality of the live feed is at 1 CIF (i.e. 352 x 240 resolution).  This is the case even if you have it set to record a camera at 4 CIF.I will be returning it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Cameras in the system record at 480TVL
Record discreetly up to 50ft of night time conditions
Cameras rated IP65, making them dust and weather proof
Dependable security and features developed with your convenience in mind
Anytime/Anywhere viewing you can monitor your system on the go on your phone or on a PC
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SDE-4003N 8 Channel DVR Security System 1TB HDD with 4 Bullet Cameras
